scripts.backend:dev: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Remove-Item Env:DATABASE_URL -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; npx --yes tsx watch --tsconfig backend/tsconfig.json backend/main.ts"
scripts.backend:render:start: prisma generate --schema prisma/schema.prisma && prisma migrate deploy --schema prisma/schema.prisma && tsx --tsconfig backend/tsconfig.json backend/main.ts
scripts.backend:kill: powershell -NoProfile -Command "& { $procs = Get-CimInstance Win32_Process -Filter \"Name='node.exe'\"; $targets = $procs | Where-Object { ($_.CommandLine -match 'tsx') -and (($_.CommandLine -match 'backend\\main\.ts') -or ($_.CommandLine -match 'backend/main\.ts')) }; foreach ($p in $targets) { try { Stop-Process -Id $p.ProcessId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} } }"
scripts.backend:dev:stable: powershell -NoProfile -Command "& { $procs = Get-CimInstance Win32_Process -Filter \"Name='node.exe'\"; $targets = $procs | Where-Object { ($_.CommandLine -match 'tsx') -and (($_.CommandLine -match 'backend\\main\.ts') -or ($_.CommandLine -match 'backend/main\.ts')) }; foreach ($p in $targets) { try { Stop-Process -Id $p.ProcessId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} }; $env:BOOT_MODULES='auth,shop,product,gallery,reservation,order,offer,invoice,users,analytics,customers,notification,feedback'; $env:MEDIA_DISABLE_CONTROLLER='true'; $env:MEDIA_OPT_ENABLE_WORKER='false'; $env:SHOP_IMPORTS='none'; $env:PRISMA_CONNECT_ON_BOOT='true'; $env:PRISMA_CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MS='5000'; $env:ADMIN_BOOTSTRAP_TOKEN='admin1234'; Remove-Item Env:MINIMAL_BOOT,Env:PORT,Env:DATABASE_URL -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $env:PORT='4000'; $env:DATABASE_URL='postgresql://ray_user:ray_password@localhost:5433/ray_marketplace?schema=public&connect_timeout=5'; npx --yes tsx watch --tsconfig backend/tsconfig.json backend/main.ts }"
scripts.backend:dev:minimal: powershell -NoProfile -Command "& { $procs = Get-CimInstance Win32_Process -Filter \"Name='node.exe'\"; $targets = $procs | Where-Object { ($_.CommandLine -match 'tsx') -and (($_.CommandLine -match 'backend\\main\.ts') -or ($_.CommandLine -match 'backend/main\.ts')) }; foreach ($p in $targets) { try { Stop-Process -Id $p.ProcessId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} }; $env:BOOT_MODULES='none'; $env:SHOP_IMPORTS='none'; $env:ADMIN_BOOTSTRAP_TOKEN='admin1234'; $env:MINIMAL_BOOT='true'; Remove-Item Env:PORT,Env:DATABASE_URL -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $env:PORT='4000'; $env:DATABASE_URL='postgresql://ray_user:ray_password@localhost:5433/ray_marketplace?schema=public'; npx --yes tsx watch --tsconfig backend/tsconfig.json backend/main.ts }"
scripts.backend:dev:auth: powershell -NoProfile -Command "& { $procs = Get-CimInstance Win32_Process -Filter \"Name='node.exe'\"; $targets = $procs | Where-Object { ($_.CommandLine -match 'tsx') -and (($_.CommandLine -match 'backend\\main\.ts') -or ($_.CommandLine -match 'backend/main\.ts')) }; foreach ($p in $targets) { try { Stop-Process -Id $p.ProcessId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} }; $env:BOOT_MODULES='auth'; $env:SHOP_IMPORTS='none'; $env:PRISMA_CONNECT_ON_BOOT='true'; $env:PRISMA_CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MS='5000'; $env:ADMIN_BOOTSTRAP_TOKEN='admin1234'; Remove-Item Env:MINIMAL_BOOT,Env:PORT,Env:DATABASE_URL -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $env:PORT='4000'; $env:DATABASE_URL='postgresql://ray_user:ray_password@localhost:5433/ray_marketplace?schema=public&connect_timeout=5'; npx --yes tsx watch --tsconfig backend/tsconfig.json backend/main.ts }"
scripts.backend:dev:auth-media: powershell -NoProfile -Command "& { $procs = Get-CimInstance Win32_Process -Filter \"Name='node.exe'\"; $targets = $procs | Where-Object { ($_.CommandLine -match 'tsx') -and (($_.CommandLine -match 'backend\\main\.ts') -or ($_.CommandLine -match 'backend/main\.ts')) }; foreach ($p in $targets) { try { Stop-Process -Id $p.ProcessId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} }; $env:BOOT_MODULES='auth,media'; $env:MEDIA_OPT_ENABLE_WORKER='false'; $env:NEST_DISABLE_LOGGER='true'; $env:PRISMA_CONNECT_ON_BOOT='true'; $env:PRISMA_CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MS='5000'; $env:ADMIN_BOOTSTRAP_TOKEN='admin1234'; Remove-Item Env:MINIMAL_BOOT,Env:PORT,Env:DATABASE_URL,Env:SHOP_IMPORTS -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $env:PORT='4000'; $env:DATABASE_URL='postgresql://ray_user:ray_password@localhost:5433/ray_marketplace?schema=public&connect_timeout=5'; npx --yes tsx watch --tsconfig backend/tsconfig.json backend/main.ts }"
scripts.backend:dev:shop-product: powershell -NoProfile -Command "& { $procs = Get-CimInstance Win32_Process -Filter \"Name='node.exe'\"; $targets = $procs | Where-Object { ($_.CommandLine -match 'tsx') -and (($_.CommandLine -match 'backend\\main\.ts') -or ($_.CommandLine -match 'backend/main\.ts')) }; foreach ($p in $targets) { try { Stop-Process -Id $p.ProcessId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} }; $env:BOOT_MODULES='shop,product'; $env:SHOP_IMPORTS='none'; $env:PRISMA_CONNECT_ON_BOOT='true'; $env:PRISMA_CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MS='5000'; $env:ADMIN_BOOTSTRAP_TOKEN='admin1234'; Remove-Item Env:MINIMAL_BOOT,Env:PORT,Env:DATABASE_URL -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $env:PORT='4000'; $env:DATABASE_URL='postgresql://ray_user:ray_password@localhost:5433/ray_marketplace?schema=public&connect_timeout=5'; npx --yes tsx watch --tsconfig backend/tsconfig.json backend/main.ts }"
scripts.backend:dev:shop-product-media: powershell -NoProfile -Command "& { $procs = Get-CimInstance Win32_Process -Filter \"Name='node.exe'\"; $targets = $procs | Where-Object { ($_.CommandLine -match 'tsx') -and (($_.CommandLine -match 'backend\\main\.ts') -or ($_.CommandLine -match 'backend/main\.ts')) }; foreach ($p in $targets) { try { Stop-Process -Id $p.ProcessId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} }; $env:BOOT_MODULES='shop,product,media'; $env:SHOP_IMPORTS='redis,media'; if (-not $env:MEDIA_CONTROLLER_MODE) { $env:MEDIA_CONTROLLER_MODE='presign' }; $env:MEDIA_OPT_ENABLE_WORKER='false'; $env:NEST_DISABLE_LOGGER='true'; $env:PRISMA_CONNECT_ON_BOOT='true'; $env:PRISMA_CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MS='5000'; $env:ADMIN_BOOTSTRAP_TOKEN='admin1234'; Remove-Item Env:MINIMAL_BOOT,Env:PORT,Env:DATABASE_URL,Env:MEDIA_DISABLE_CONTROLLER -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $env:PORT='4000'; $env:DATABASE_URL='postgresql://ray_user:ray_password@localhost:5433/ray_marketplace?schema=public&connect_timeout=5'; npx --yes tsx watch --tsconfig backend/tsconfig.json backend/main.ts }"
scripts.backend:dev:shop-product-media-offer:ful: powershell -NoProfile -Command "& { $procs = Get-CimInstance Win32_Process -Filter \"Name='node.exe'\"; $targets = $procs | Where-Object { ($_.CommandLine -match 'tsx') -and (($_.CommandLine -match 'backend\\main\.ts') -or ($_.CommandLine -match 'backend/main\.ts')) }; foreach ($p in $targets) { try { Stop-Process -Id $p.ProcessId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} }; $env:BOOT_MODULES='shop,product,media,offer'; $env:SHOP_IMPORTS='redis,media'; $env:MEDIA_CONTROLLER_MODE='full'; $env:MEDIA_OPT_ENABLE_WORKER='false'; $env:NEST_DISABLE_LOGGER='true'; $env:PRISMA_CONNECT_ON_BOOT='true'; $env:PRISMA_CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MS='5000'; $env:ADMIN_BOOTSTRAP_TOKEN='admin1234'; Remove-Item Env:MINIMAL_BOOT,Env:PORT,Env:DATABASE_URL,Env:MEDIA_DISABLE_CONTROLLER -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $env:PORT='4000'; $env:DATABASE_URL='postgresql://ray_user:ray_password@localhost:5433/ray_marketplace?schema=public&connect_timeout=5'; npx --yes tsx watch --tsconfig backend/tsconfig.json backend/main.ts }"
scripts.backend:dev:store-editor:full: powershell -NoProfile -Command "& { $procs = Get-CimInstance Win32_Process -Filter \"Name='node.exe'\"; $targets = $procs | Where-Object { ($_.CommandLine -match 'tsx') -and (($_.CommandLine -match 'backend\\main\.ts') -or ($_.CommandLine -match 'backend/main\.ts')) }; foreach ($p in $targets) { try { Stop-Process -Id $p.ProcessId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} }; $env:BOOT_MODULES='shop,product,media,offer,notification,image-map'; $env:SHOP_IMPORTS='redis,media'; $env:MEDIA_CONTROLLER_MODE='full'; $env:MEDIA_OPT_ENABLE_WORKER='false'; $env:NEST_DISABLE_LOGGER='true'; $env:PRISMA_CONNECT_ON_BOOT='true'; $env:PRISMA_CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MS='5000'; $env:ADMIN_BOOTSTRAP_TOKEN='admin1234'; Remove-Item Env:MINIMAL_BOOT,Env:PORT,Env:DATABASE_URL,Env:MEDIA_DISABLE_CONTROLLER -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $env:PORT='4000'; $env:DATABASE_URL='postgresql://ray_user:ray_password@localhost:5433/ray_marketplace?schema=public&connect_timeout=5'; npx --yes tsx watch --tsconfig backend/tsconfig.json backend/main.ts }"
scripts.backend:dev:no-media: powershell -NoProfile -Command "& { $procs = Get-CimInstance Win32_Process -Filter \"Name='node.exe'\"; $targets = $procs | Where-Object { ($_.CommandLine -match 'tsx') -and (($_.CommandLine -match 'backend\\main\.ts') -or ($_.CommandLine -match 'backend/main\.ts')) }; foreach ($p in $targets) { try { Stop-Process -Id $p.ProcessId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} }; $env:BOOT_MODULES='auth,shop,product,gallery,reservation,order,offer,invoice,users,analytics,customers,notification,feedback'; $env:SHOP_IMPORTS='none'; $env:PRISMA_CONNECT_ON_BOOT='true'; $env:PRISMA_CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MS='5000'; $env:ADMIN_BOOTSTRAP_TOKEN='admin1234'; Remove-Item Env:MINIMAL_BOOT,Env:PORT,Env:DATABASE_URL -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $env:PORT='4000'; $env:DATABASE_URL='postgresql://ray_user:ray_password@localhost:5433/ray_marketplace?schema=public&connect_timeout=5'; npx --yes tsx watch --tsconfig backend/tsconfig.json backend/main.ts }"

scripts.backend:dev:clean: npm run backend:kill && npm run backend:dev:stable
scripts.build: tsx scripts/compress-public-videos.ts && npx vite build --config vite.config.mts
scripts.checks: npm run backend:typecheck && npm run backend:build && npm run typecheck && npm run test
scripts.vercel-build: npm run backend:build && npm run build
scripts.backend:dev:fix: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$env:DATABASE_URL='postgresql://ray_user:ray_password@localhost:5433/ray_marketplace?schema=public'; npx --yes tsx watch --tsconfig backend/tsconfig.json backend/main.ts"
